headline: Trump’s Push Against Powell Adds to Doubts of US’s Haven Status
summary: (Bloomberg) -- The sell-America trade gathered momentum on Monday on concern President Donald Trump will act upon his threat of firing Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell and implement policies that lead to a recession.Most Read from BloombergDOGE Visits National Gallery of Art to Discuss Museum’s Legal StatusTrump Administration Takes Over New York Penn Station RevampDOGE Places Entire Staff of Federal Homelessness Agency on LeaveNashville’s $3 Billion Transit Plan Brings a Call for Zoning R
